errorMessage: Reload this page and if the problem persists try again later.

errorTip.permission-denied: You haven't got permission to edit this text.
errorTip.resource-exhausted: Currently there are too many requests to this app. Try again later.
errorTip.unknown: Something unexpected has occurred. Try again later.

description.first: Minimarkdown is a text editor where nothing will distract you from writing. You're free from annoying popups and prolonged configuration. And all of this with the support of Markdown.
description.second: You can always preview your text to see how it will render in HTML. Basics of Markdown syntax are presented below.

404.header: There is a problem with the address
